p.p: A code to describe the ADRT preferences.

p.strong: This is a preliminary set of values, for the full list consult the latest published version of the SNOMED CT subset with Original ID 47731000000135.

concept.displayName: Has advance decision to refuse treatment (Mental Capacity Act 2005) (finding)
Has advance decision to refuse life sustaining treatment (Mental Capacity Act 2005) (finding)
